channel.title: Thank you page still mentions pre-order
channel.description:
Hi! Thanks for writing this book. I just purchased it, and I believe this is after the pre-order period, but I noticed the `Thank you` page after purchasing still mentions `pre-order`.
> Thank you for your pre-order! You will receive an email with a download link shortly.
This is certainly not a big deal, but just thought you might want to know. Thanks again! Looking forward to working through the book.

item.title: Thank you page still mentions pre-order
item.dc:creator: keleshev
item.description:
Welcome, @JoshMcguigan! Thanks for noting, I will update the page.

Read full topic
item.source: Thank you page still mentions pre-order

item.description:
Hi! Thanks for writing this book. I just purchased it, and I believe this is after the pre-order period, but I noticed the Thank you page after purchasing still mentions pre-order.

Thank you for your pre-order! You will receive an email with a download link shortly.

This is certainly not a big deal, but just thought you might want to know. Thanks again! Looking forward to working through the book.
